cellot.train package#

Submodules#

cellot.train.experiment module#

cellot.train.experiment.generate_random_string(n=8)#

Generates random strings from ASCII lowercase letters and digits.

Parameters

n – int, length of random strings to be generated. Default is 8.

Returns

A random string with length n.

cellot.train.experiment.name_expdir()#

Automatically generates the export directory for an experiment.

Returns

An instance of Path containing the target export directory.

cellot.train.experiment.parse_config_cli(path, args)#
cellot.train.experiment.prepare(argv)#

Prepares the experiment information including export directory and configuration.

Parameters

argv – configuration to be loaded.

Returns

A ConfigDict object containing the configuration information and a Path object for exporting results.

cellot.train.experiment.write_config(path, config)#

Writes the configuration to a YAML file.

Parameters

  • path – Path, the path where the YAML file is stored.

  • config – ConfigDict or dict, the configuration to be stored.
